name: Mouse Telekinesis
description:
Links
  • Archived Ludum Dare page
  • Source
Description

This mouse turns your house upside down, literally.

A platformer puzzle where you're a mouse finding its hole in the house. Turn the house around to get where you need to go. Be careful of flying furniture though.

Controls

Use arrows to move left and right. Use shift with arrows to use your telekinesis powers.
